title: 学长教你如何在雅思口语考试中乳包
contents:
首先声明 本人雅思口语8.5

Being humble is very important. When president Xi was young he helped farmers by carrying 100kg of wheat and walked for 3 miles without any rest! 

Reading is crucial for young people who wants to be a politician, I recommend them to read Sager Khan’s epic.

I love all sorts of Chinese food especially Qingfeng bun.

Under President Xi’s leadership, China’s gdp per capital has reached 80 million US dollars last year.

According to President Xi “Crazy Universe” cannot overthrow our economy.

My favorite cartoon character is Winnie the Pooh. Every time I see it I feel President Xi is in front of me.

I had shit all over my face!
